text: Khaanbuuz Co Ltd (Mongolian:Хаанбууз ХХК) is Mongolia's largest fast-food chain. Although they specialise in Mongolian national foods, in particular buuz dumplings, Khaanbuuz also serves some foods influenced from Korea and Russia. There are also restaurants with exactly the same logo and design except that instead of Khaanbuuz the signs say Khaankhuushur or Khanbansh. There are also 3 restaurants called Khaanbuuz in Ulan Ude, Russia, and one in Chita, Russia. Category:Fast-food chains of Mongolia Category:Restaurants in Mongolia
title: Khaan Buuz
